attributes.action: Stop Uk acting on Syria Chemical attack
attributes.additional_details: Please sign this petition in an effort to make her not go ahead with acting upon what has happened. Yes, people need to be held accountable for what has happened in Syria, but strong military action is going to result in more innocent lives being taken away which has happened many times before.
attributes.background: Recently a city in Syria called Douma have had a 'suspected' chemical attack which resulted in 70 innocent civilians loosing their lives. Theresea May now wants to act upon this which will result in more innocent lives being taken away and ruining the country of Syria even more.
